Title: NEMA rescues 294 Nigerians from Niger Republic
Summary: The National Emergency Management Agency has facilitated the return of 294 Nigerian migrant returnees from Agadez, Niger Republic . The agency, in a statement released on Saturday, disclosed that the repatriation operation took place on Saturday .

Title: Kano electoral boss, others face money laundering charges
Summary: The Chairman of the Kano State Independent Electoral Commission (KANSIEC), Professor Sani Lawan Malumfashi, has been accused of money laundering, alongside two senior officials of the commission, over an alleged illegal transaction involving N1 billion .

Title: Five Nigerian artistes who have performed at biggest global football events
Summary: Nigerian music is no longer limited to clubs, radio, or streaming platforms . It now commands attention at football's biggest events . Afrobeats stars have performed live at global matches, thrilling fans with unforgettable shows .

Title: Ifa council threatens to sue Ogun govt, Awujale’s family over burial
Summary: The International Council for Ifa Religion (ICIR) has threatened to take legal action against the Ogun State Government and the family of the late Awujale of Ijebuland, Oba Sikiru Kayode Adetona . Title: The fiery rhythms of GoodGirl LA
Summary: GoodGirl LA has been redefining what it means to be a ‘good girl’ since her debut album, La Confidential . She has released a self-titled EP on her six-year career .

Title: Israel, Syria leaders agree on ceasefire – US envoy
Summary: The United States on Wednesday announced a deal in which Syrian government forces retreated from Sweida . Israel, Syria leaders agree on ceasefire – US envoy .

Title: Osun Senator Fadahunsi quits PDP
Summary: Osun Senator Fadahunsi attributed his exit to ongoing internal conflicts and unresolved legal wrangling that have persisted within the party . The senator attributed the senator's exit to internal conflicts .
